Name: Edict of Absolution
Title: Edict of Absolution
Desc: "Every last Fontainian is guilty, with judgment and doom certain to one day fall upon them â€” this is neither metaphor nor rhetoric."

Talent.Name: Edict of Absolution
Talent.Desc: In this Round, the target character is immune to Frozen, Stun, Petrification, and other effects that prevent the use of Skills. Also, if this character is the active character, they will not be switched out due to effects.\n(Only one {SPRITE_PRESET#3007}"Arcane Legend" card can be played per match. This card will be in your starting hand.)
